section_text: 1 The Agreement containing Terms of Union between Canada and Newfoundland set out in the Schedule to this Act is hereby confirmed and shall have the force of law notwithstanding anything in the British North America Acts 1867 to 1946.
3 This Act may be cited as the British North America Act 1949, and the British North America Acts 1867 to 1946, and this Act may be cited together as the British North America Acts 1867 to 1949.
